title: Microsoft Windows 2000 Professional SP4 + Office 2000 Premium
description:
= Microsoft Windows 2000 Professional SP4

Bootable ISO with working serial key


= Microsoft Office 2000 Premium Edition

Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, Access, and FrontPage - No serial key needed


- - - -


I have both of these installed on an old Pentium 3 Dell box and they are running smoothly!

All are fully updateable via Microsoft Update

Scanned with NOD32 AntiVirus and are virus free

Please remember to seed for a while

Long live WIN2K!!!
